content:
TerrorJack opened Issue #2894:

According to https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/blob/main/crates/c-api/include/doc-wasm.h#L1500, wasm_module_serialize/wasm_module_deserialize are unimplemented, but that's not the case. Of course, users should favor wasmtime_module_serialize/wasmtime_module_deserialize when possible, but this is still a minor bug in documentation.
